|brand = Z-Com |model = XI-300 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (VB.1) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = d601 |device_id = 0002 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = M4Y-XI-300, PBA-SP905, PRL-IWE1200, LZU-MAP-811E- |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:60:B3
|chip1 = Harris;HFA3841;HFA3841CN; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861B; |chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A; |chip4 = Intersil;HFA3783;
|antconn = RP-MMCX |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = schematics |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/08/2001 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Used in the models: *Interepoch IWE1200A (FCC ID: PRL-IWE1200) *[[Macromate MAP-811E]] (FCC ID: LZU-MAP-811E-) *[[IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Gateway (DR-E200W)]] :FRU: 22P6401, 22P6409; Model DR-E200W, OEM: [[Delta Networks]], :(may be similar to the [[Compaq iPAQ Connection Point CP-2W]]).
Device is also the Micronet SP905 (FCC ID: PBA-SP905 [https://fccid.io/PBA-SP905/Schematics/Circuit-Diagram-125364 schematics]). {{see also|Delta Networks LM-WP100}}
===Specifications=== *Model: Z-Com XI-300 ([https://fccid.io/PBA-SP905/Schematics/Circuit-Diagram-125364.iframe schematics]) *Chipset: [[Intersil]] PRISM II *MAC: [[Harris]] HFA3841CN *BBP: [[Intersil]] HFA3861B *QAM: [[Intersil]] HFA3783 *RFIC: [[Intersil]] HFA3683A *PA: [[Intersil]] HFA3983
===PRISM Devices=== [https://wikidevi.com/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/PRISM%20Models.html PRISM Models] - Z-Com (Elsa/Zcommax) *[[Z-Com XI-300]] 0xd601:0x0002 - PRISM II FCC ID: M4Y-XI-300 *[[Z-Com XI-325]] 0xd601:0x0005 - PRISM 2.5 FCC ID: M4Y-000325 *[[Z-Com LANEscape/APDL-325]] 0xd601:0x0006 - FCC ID: M4Y-000325 ? *[[Z-Com XI-325H]] 0xd601 (200mW) - PRISM 2.5 FCC ID: M4Y-0325H *[[Z-Com XI-325H2]] 0xd601 (370mW) - PRISM 2.5 FCC ID: M4Y-325H2 *[[Z-Com XI-325HP+]] 0xd601 (300mW) - PRISM 2.5 FCC ID: M4Y-XI-325HP *[[Z-Com XI-330HP]] 0xd601:0x000? - PRISM 3 FCC ID: M4Y-XI330HP *[[Z-Com XI-626]] / [[Netgear MA311]] (PCI) - PRISM 2.5 FCC ID: M4Y-06260 *[[Z-Com XI-1500]] / XI-1450 (PCMCIA) - PRISM 2.5 FCC ID: M4Y-0325H
[[Category:English Documentation]]
